verses.verse: וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> bish-Nat year אַחַ֔ת <WH259> 'a-Chat, Also I in the first לְדָרְיָ֖וֶשׁ <WH1867> le-da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius הַמָּדִ֑י <WH4075> ham-ma-Di; the Mede עָמְדִ֛י <WH5975> 'a-me-Di arose לְמַחֲזִ֥יק <WH2388> le-ma-cha-Zik to confirm וּלְמָע֖וֹז <WH4581> u-le-ma-'oz and to strengthen לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְיִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> ve-yish-Lach He shall stretch forth יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand בַּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> ba-'a-ra-Tzot; also upon the countries וְאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> ve-'E-retz and the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh will not לִפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <WH6413> lif-lei-Tah. shall not escape

וּמָשַׁ֗ל <WH4910> u-ma-Shal, But he shall have power בְּמִכְמַנֵּי֙ <WH4362> be-mich-man-Nei over the treasures הַזָּהָ֣ב <WH2091> haz-za-Hav of gold וְהַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> ve-hak-Ke-sef, and of silver וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all חֲמֻד֣וֹת <WH2530> cha-mu-Dot beauty מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; things of Egypt וְלֻבִ֥ים <WH3864> ve-lu-Vim and the Libyans וְכֻשִׁ֖ים <WH3569> ve-chu-Shim and the Ethiopians בְּמִצְעָדָֽיו׃ <WH4703> be-mitz-'a-Dav. [shall be] at his steps

וּשְׁמֻע֣וֹת <WH8052> u-she-mu-'ot But tidings יְבַהֲלֻ֔הוּ <WH926> ye-va-ha-Lu-hu, shall trouble מִמִּזְרָ֖ח <WH4217> mi-miz-Rach out of the east וּמִצָּפ֑וֹן <WH6828> u-mitz-tza-Fon; and out of the north וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza him therefore he shall go forth בְּחֵמָ֣א <WH2534> be-che-Ma fury גְדֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah, with great לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <WH8045> le-hash-Mid to destroy וּֽלְהַחֲרִ֖ים <WH2763> u-le-ha-cha-Rim and utterly to make away רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> rab-Bim. many

וְיִטַּע֙ <WH5193> ve-yit-Ta' And he shall plant אָהֳלֶ֣י <WH168> 'o-ho-Lei the tabernacles אַפַּדְנ֔וֹ <WH643> ap-pad-No, of his palace בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between יַמִּ֖ים <WH3220> yam-Mim between the seas לְהַר־ <WH2022> le-har- mountain צְבִי־ <WH6643> tze-vi- in the glorious קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh; holy וּבָא֙ <WH935> u-Va yet he shall come עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against קִצּ֔וֹ <WH7093> kitz-Tzo, to his end וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and no עוֹזֵ֖ר <WH5826> o-Zer and none shall help לֽוֹ׃ lo.
